title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1625-7.4 - Vacation, sick leave, retirement membership, health insurance and related benefits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1625-7.4 - Vacation, sick leave, retirement membership, health insurance and related benefits

State Regulations

Vacation, sick leave, retirement membership, health
insurance and related benefits, as established by the authority, should
normally be comparable to those established by the local
municipality. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1625-7.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
